title: Borrowed Beauty Queen
description: It has been said that ugly ducklings eventually become swans, but not without ruffling a few feathers along the way. There's a crack in Nicky Gardner's shell and she's about to be shoved out of her comfort zone. When Nicky's arch nemesis, Britney Dixon, secretly enters her into the local beauty pageant as a mean prank, Britney gets more than she bargained for when Nicky decides to go through with it! With a new attitude, a new look, and some new friends, Nicky changes the playing field and proves that staying in your shell isn't all it's cracked up to be. Look for Borrowed Beauty Queen in November 2015!
author: Amber Newberry
